GUI

Class MyMenuBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.MyMenyBarModel
      • GUI.MyMenuBar

  • public class MyMenuBar
extends MyMenyBarModel
    Class to descibe action of menu, also insert menu items in menus.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyMenuBar

        public MyMenuBar()
        Basic constructor. It creates each menu and insert menu items in it. It creates main menu, insert file menu items, export menu items and help menu items.
